trans-unit.source: RootPage ID: ID of the homepage of the website
MetaNav ID: ID of the starting page of the meta navigation.
Logo text for the header area:If no image is provided, this text is displayed. If an image is provided, this text is used for the alt and title attributes.
Logo file:Path to a logo file, e.g. fileadmin/logo.png or EXT:sitepackageone/Resources/Public/Images/logo.png
Page title as heading:Displays the title of a subpage as the H2 heading of the section.
